topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
I just ate a steak.

It was terrible. The meat was not fresh, the sauce was too dilute and it was too well done.
The mushroom soup with garlic bread wasn't so good either. It was powdered soup, there was too much spice and too much water was used. But the bread was soft and crispy so +1 points for that.

"@PaskaNaakka":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54e2020c6368722158771c00#post_54e2020c6368722158771c00
Happy Birthday.

Now you will remember that you are one year older. You will look at your past and wondered what could've done during those years of your life. Also, you will remember that you are now closer to Death than ever before.

~I'm sorry, I've been influenced by this birthday song.~
topics.author: 4fe1b9f47f123b13df002976

topics.body: So how old are ya now?
